description:
Naruto and the others take on the oncoming challenges in order to find the secret technique and break the previous record set by the Fourth Hokage. But Naruto’s impulsive action leads the group into various troubles.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Alla ricerca dell`eredità del Quarto Hokage (seconda parte)
Big Adventure! Search for the Fourth Hokage`s Legacy - Part 2
Daibouken! Yondaime no Isan o Sagase: Kouhen
L`héritage du Quatrième du nom - 2ème Partie
大冒険! 四代目の遺産を探せ・後編
